With wood floors in our apartment, my wife and I long ago decided that a good mat underneath our dog's bowls was the only way to go. Despite having moved and no longer having wood as a concern, we remained in the habit since it really aided in clean-up. Before using the PetProjekt Dogmat, we had a silicone mat which, though grippy, seemed to attract every single piece of hair and dirt in the house! We were very pleased to get the Dogmat, and would like to thank PetProjekt for sending us a sample to review.

Allow me to start by listing the things that I LOVE about this mat:

1) By design, it grips both the floor and any dog bowl with non-slip ridges. Our dog likes to paw at her water bowl when it's empty, which until now would often send it rolling!
2) It is dishwasher safe - making cleaning it more than easy!
3) It is BPA and phthalate-free. If and when your dog licks any food or water that spills, they aren't lapping up toxic residues!
4) It is thick and very durable!

If I had to list one MINUSCULE issue, it would be that after being shipped (and I assume stored) in a rolled-up fashion, it took a good week or so to properly flatten out. In retrospect, a few heavy books would have helped with the process, but I wanted to mention it so that anyone reading can be prepared. This is the only (very minor) issue with this product, so it gets full marks from me and I highly recommend adding it to your list of possibilities when looking for a new mat!
Very satisfied wit this product.

I have a 9-year-old beagle mix that's beginning to show signs of senility.  Our vet recommended that we try this to help him before moving to any of the prescription medications, and recommended an online purchase for the best pricing.  After using this for 2 months, I can say that it's definitely made a difference.  The dog was sitting in the corner, staring at the wall, or hiding off by himself too much of the time previously.  Since we've started this regimen, he's now much more active with the other dogs and we seldom find him off to himself.  It's as though the clock has rolled back 2-3 years, and I couldn't be happier.  We know that a time will come when this ceases to help, but thankfully with this product we now have more quality time with him and he seems happy again.  I've talked with several others who have used the product with their pets, and all have reported the same reaction, with no negatives.  I highly recommend this supplement!
summary: Highly recommended by Vet, and now by me!

I have a one year old bull terrier mix (we think jack russell). She's very smart and I've gotten her to stop pulling on the leash.... but if she sees a dog, she goes nuts! She pulls and pulls, and never quite learned to bark, so she makes this odd growling/grumbling noise until she can go "meet" the other dog. Then she'll calm down and will lose interest in the other dog quite quickly. But if we can't see the other dog (like if the dog is across the street, etc), she continues to go nuts and pulls, pulls, pulls, until it looks like her eyes are going to pop put of her head. I would often have to pick her up to calm her down and get her to be quiet. It was scary for me, thinking she was going to pass out at any given moment, but also embarrassing because she couldn't keep it together. As soon as I used the harness and leash for the first time, she was like a different dog!!! She initially tried to pull but all it took was a small clicking noise and a 'no, Happy, let's go' and she calmed down! She doesn't huff and puff, doesn't go nuts, and now walking her is extremely enjoyable! I honestly could not be happier.

PROS:
* Nice colors
* Good quality
* Easy to put on
* Easy to adjust size
* Affordable/ worth the money
* No more strain on her neck
* No more huffing and puffing
* Keeps my dog calmer, as if the previous collar (regular, everyday collar) was stressing her out even more, causing her to act out more than she normally would.
* Encourages the dog to stop obsessing over the desired object (car, dog, squirrel), and turn around to make eye contact with you. This has been a huge help for us!
* Lets the dog know that YOU are in control without hurting/pinching/choking
* My dog has had no issue getting used to this harness, she seems very comfortable.

CONS:
* I do wish the leash was adjustable. I'd love to be able to make it longer!
* The harness is a bit clunky. By that I mean the clasps that snap it together are very big and very dark. I bought the turquoise harness/leash combo and the clasps are huge and black. It looks kind of funny, but no big deal at all.

It's important to note that this doesn't completely stop your dog from pulling. It's a training tool that greatly decreases pulling... but a lot of it is up to the owner to make the dog understand not to pull! This has been a huge help for us, thank you so much for making such a great product.
summary: Love it! Could not be happier.
